overview: Procastinaci칩n is a series of random images, situations and events; a timeless visual record of characters, places and stories, a narrative creation through the conjunction of events recorded in random sequences involving four characters who lack moral, ethical and "normal" or "traditional" aspects of behavior. All stacked up in the same recording record that shows a dark aspect of behavior, the randomness of life and a grim view of us all.
